Pydio 8.2.3 was successfully installed!

This is a bugfix and security release for Pydio 8.X, see the Changelog below for commits details.
  • Remove symlink (details)
  • Fix zoho display in IE11 (details)
  • fix download multiple files on windows env (details)
  • fix download all on smb workspace (details)
  • fix php72 compat (details)
  • Add export user list action (details)
  • Remove unused variables (details)
  • replace deprecated function (details)
  • bypass writing error in text log (details)
  • fix permission merging with mask (details)
  • Let video player add its own cookie (details)
  • Remove support for legacyShares (details)
  • Seed the version number with server uuid (details)
  • Do not open html ctype in external window (details)
  • Set webdav force basic auth to true by default (details)
  • Move some configs in inc file (details)
